game.name: Bililitz
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bililitz is a vertical roguelike with procedurally generated worlds. Explore mysterious depths, collect items, and discover portals to new challenges. Compete in the global ranking system to prove your skill and reach the top!
